# kVTDecompressionProperty_DeinterlaceMode_Temporal

**Global Variable**

A temporal deinterlace mode.

## Declaration

```swift
let kVTDecompressionProperty_DeinterlaceMode_Temporal: CFString
```

## Discussion

Applies a filter that uses a window of multiple frames to generate deinterlaced results, and provides a better result at the expense of a pipeline delay.

This mode is only used if [doc://com.apple.videotoolbox/documentation/VideoToolbox/VTDecodeFrameFlags/kVTDecodeFrame_EnableTemporalProcessing] is set, otherwise a non-temporal mode will be used instead.

## Deinterlace Modes

- **kVTDecompressionProperty_DeinterlaceMode_VerticalFilter**: A vertical filter deinterlace mode.
title: kVTDecompressionProperty_DeinterlaceMode_Temporal
